sources.title: Omoo-Omoo the Shark God
sources.description: When a sacred jungle idol is violated, the curse of a shark god follows a group of people. After a sea captain (Trevor Bardette) removes black pearls from a sacred native shrine, the curse of the shark god falls upon him and anyone else with whom he comes in contact with, according to the native legend. Disaster strikes everyone in the cast, except for the one person who will survive the curse. Based on the Herman Melville Novel.

sources.title: Omoo-Omoo the Shark God (1949) JUNGLE ADVENTURE
sources.description:
Stars: Ron Randell, Devera Burton, Trevor Bardette 
Director: Leon Leonard

The curse of a shark god follows a group of people who have violated a sacred jungle idol.
